title: Underdog | Bear, Person of Interest
author: SquiresIsle
comment: This is so sweet and funny, thank you for making it! Everyone loves Bear and rightly so <33333333
who in the POV of The Machine DISLIKED this?
Thx for the video! the music not so much.
description:
Another character-focused video (after Soldier's Eyes, Man & Machine, and Trouble in Mind), this time on everyone's favorite character: BEAR! 

Music: "Underdog," by The Blanks
